amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to strengthening the Provider Relief Fund, including a 20 percent set aside for rural hospitals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 546 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 26.

action.text: Amendment SA 546 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S441; text: CR S441) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to strengthening the Provider Relief Fund, including a 20 percent set aside for rural hospitals.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 546 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 26.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 546 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 26.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 546 proposed by Senator Collins.
